companies.name: Green Coffee Company
companies.address: La Cascada Farm, Ciudad Bolívar, Antioquia, Colombia
companies.description: Colombia's largest coffee grower, operating over 45 farms with more than 11 million coffee trees. They focus on vertical integration, sustainability, and traceability in coffee production.

companies.name: Sistemas Sentry
companies.description: Sistemas Sentry provides digital queue systems, customer service solutions, and cloud software for managing in-person, remote, and virtual service experiences. With over 27 years in the industry, they specialize in enhancing client attention and operational efficiency.

companies.name: Eatsy Market
companies.description: E-commerce platform offering fresh groceries and healthy products with consolidated next-day delivery. Promotes local brands and organic foods in Medellín.

companies.name: Inversiones eSystem
companies.description: Inversiones eSystem specializes in developing POS (Point of Sale) software solutions, offering services like electronic invoicing, inventory management, and financial reporting to help businesses streamline their operations.

companies.name: HealthPlus Clinics
companies.description: HealthPlus Clinics is a healthcare provider offering a range of medical services. Specific details about their services and locations are limited based on the available information.

companies.name: Ofima S.A.S
companies.address: Calle 30A #82A - 26, Torre Ejecutiva Los Molinos Piso 19, Medellín, Colombia
companies.description: Ofima provides ERP software solutions tailored to different business sectors including manufacturing, retail, and services. Their cloud-based tools enhance operational efficiency and decision-making through data-driven automation and management.
